lead_paragraph: Turkish authorities are starting to uncover evidence about a gun attack on an Istanbul nightclub which killed 39 people on Sunday but there is no clarity yet on who was responsible, Turkish Prime Minister Binali Yildirim said.
snippet: Turkish authorities are starting to uncover evidence about a gun attack on an Istanbul nightclub which killed 39 people on Sunday but there is no clarity yet on who was responsible, Turkish Prime Minister Binali Yildirim said....

headline.main: No Clarity Yet on Responsibility for Istanbul Attack: Turkish PM
headline.print_headline: No Clarity Yet on Responsibility for Istanbul Attack: Turkish PM
